Html:
Sorry if it's mentioned somewhere, I can't find out how to filter out Heroic mode gear.  Is that possible?  If not, i'd love to see it added as a filter option.

Thanks!
Did you see the Filters dropdown in the top right?

Astrylian wrote:

Did you see the Filters dropdown in the top right?

Of course.  But I don't see an option for Heroic Raids.  Only Heroic dungeons.
If you don't see Heroic under Tier 10 Raids > Icecrown, then it sounds like you have a really really old version, and should upgrade.

Thanks Astrylian, appreciate the quick responses!

I'm using the online version.  Turns out I didn't realize there were sub-menus for each main filter line. :/

/facepalm
